Name: pan-drmuhamadhabibb-la
Author: Dr. Muhamad Habib, Bhai Harpreet Singh, Maulana Wahiduddin Khan

Translations.Text: Jadom hona vali ghatana ho javegi
Usa de vaparana vica ko'i jhutha nahim
Uha ninva ate uca karana vali hovegi
Jadom dharati hila diti javegi
Ate pahara tuta ke cura cura ho janage
Phira uha khilari ho'i dhura sana ke rahi janage
Ate tusim loka tina tar'ham de ho javenge
Phira saje hatha vale, ki khuba hana
Ate khabe hatha vale (aphasosa), khabe hatha vale kiho jihe bure hana
Ate age vale tam age vale hi hana
Uha nere rahina vale loka hana
Ni'amatam de bagam vica
Unham di vadi sakhi'am pahile lokam vica hovegi
Ate thorhe pichali'am vicom honage
(Hire moti'am nala) jara'u takhatam te
Sir'hana la ke ahamane sahamane baithe honage
Unham de kola hamesam rahina vale bace (naujavana) ghuma rahe honage
Kapa ate jaga lai ke ate vadhi'a saraba da pi'ala
Usa nala na sira dukhega na budhi vica vikara avega
Ate fala jihare uha cahuna zuna laina
Ate pachi'am da uha masa jihara unham nu pasada hove
Ate vadi'am akham vali'am (khubasurata) huram
Jivem dhake ho'e moti de dane
Fala unham karamam da jihare uha karade sana
Usa vica uha ko'i vi'aratha ate papa di gala nahim sunanage
Paratu sirafa unham nu salama hovega
Ate saje vale, ki khuba hana saje vale
Bera de rukham vica jinham vica kada nahim
Ate keli'am de guche
ate phaili ho'i cham
Ate vagada ho'i'a pani
Ate bhanta bhanta de fala
Jihare na khatama honage. Ate na unham nu ko'i roka toka hovegi
Ate uce baî€¼isatare
Asim unham auratam nu khasa taura te bana'i'a
Phira unham nu kavari'am rakhi'a hai
Manamohana vali'am ate ika samana umara vali'am
Saje vali'am la'i
